thread.title: Bella Thorne indulges in fro-yo after work out with sister | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Bella Thorne indulges in fro-yo after work out with sister | Daily Mail Online

author: Kelvera At Dailymail.Com
title: Bella Thorne indulges in fro-yo after work out with sister | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share The singing actress heaped on the jewelry, wearing several necklaces while you could spot her edgy septum piercing glinting in the sun. Constant companions: Bella never seems to be far from her older sister Dani, who is also an actress Dani complimented her sisters cool look in her own belly baring ensemble, wearing a dark sports bra with a patched covered racing jacket and rainbow tie dye backpack As the pair crossed the street, the sisters laughed at a private joke together. The former Disney star later shared a aeries of photos from their workout on Snapchat. Dance it off: The actress appeared to be having a great time with friends, including her older sister, Dani (left) Hug it out: The close sisters shared a sweet embrace, which was all captured on Bella's Snapchat New man? A glitter covered Bella seemed particularly close to her male companion during her work out However, from the looks of it, there wasn't much working out going on, with Bella and Dani both hamming it up for the camera with friends. One photo shows the punk princess shrugging off her jacket and poking her tongue out, while in another, she's hugging her big sister. The star and her sister seem to be the closest of friends. Twenty-four-year-old Dani is spotted with her Shake It Up sibling close to constantly. Studio selfie: Bella tweeted a picture of herself working on songs after a fan asked about her musical projects Music to fans ears! On Tuesday, the star told fans she was working hard on new music to share Yesterday, the multi-talented actress shared some of her other creative pursuits as she got down to making some music. After a fan told the star they 'needed' more of her music, Bella tweeted a picture of herself hard at work in the studio. She showed off the instrument filled recording spot on Snapchat, which was complete with professional mics, mixers and a full drum kit. Fans of Bella's music can look forward to the teen's first full length release, which she's promises will be ready ASAP. Share or comment on this article 8
